Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{3: 'Once again, the Norman Mining Corp transport shuttle is preparing for takeoff.'}
{3: 'Just like last time, the spaceport is bustling with the lively chatter of people.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff Member 1', 3: 'Wow... I thought none of the last batch made it back? Why are we still seeing so many people this time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff Member 1', 3: 'Are they really not afraid of death?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff Member 2', 3: "That's why their corporation is vast and thriving, while you're still here guarding the port.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He lowers his voice mysteriously.'}
{2: 'Staff Member 2', 3: "I've heard from friends that Norman Mining Corp got their hands on some top-secret military intel!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Staff Member 2', 3: "Rumor has it there's a new method to enhance the Inver-Device, allowing even ordinary Constructs to withstand high concentrations of the Punishing Virus...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Staff Member 1', 3: "Eek, you actually believe that? I still think it's one of Norman Mining Corp's little tricks.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff Member 2', 3: "No way. Do you know who's leading the team this time? It's Victoria!", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Staff Member 2', 3: "She's the heiress of Norman Mining Corp, the future Chief Executive! Didn't you see the news a few days ago? I don't think Norman Mining Corp would risk their own heiress like that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Staff Member 1', 3: "That's true...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Norman Mining Corp vehicles slowly pull over. A pink-haired man jumps out from the first one.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Ah... What a beautiful day.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'I wonder if the weather on the ground is just as nice?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: 'According to the current landing plan, your touchdown point will be near Reactor 1.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Chances are, you won't even get to see today's weather.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Tsk, can\'t you think of something positive? What if I am so talented and actually bring back the "glory" flawlessly?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'I wish that would happen...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Trojan looks the man up and down with disdain.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "But I just hope your protective suit doesn't fall apart upon landing, so I have a chance to bring you back in one piece.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory896.jpg'}
{3: 'Three hours ago.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Victoria', 3: 'We will bring back the sparks of hope.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Herald', 3: 'We will bring back the sparks of hope.'}
{3: 'The chosen "Heralds" gather in a dim room, reciting the creeds of Norman Mining Corp that they had been taught for decades.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Victoria', 3: '...Head back and prepare. The shuttle will depart in three hours.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory901.jpg'}
{3: 'After the brief meeting ends, Victoria stands alone in the meeting room outside.'}
{3: 'On the wall hangs a massive portrait she recently commissioned from a World Government Association of Art painter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Victoria', 3: 'When we meet again, everything will be over...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Yo, Victoria. It's been a while!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Victoria', 3: 'Why are you here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Hey, don't underestimate me. I had to deal with those old foxes in the Parliament every day!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "The little troubles you had set up couldn't slow down your big brother.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "You're really not considering my feelings at all, Victoria.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Victoria', 3: 'I have nothing to say to you—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before her words even fall, a tranquilizer dart pierces her neck.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonardo', 3: "You're so slow, Trojan.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: "For what you paid, that's the speed you get. I can go faster, but it'll cost extra.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She gently places the deeply asleep Victoria onto a chair in the meeting room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Are you sure you want to do this now...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'What else then?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Leonardo adjusts his collar with his signature chilling grin.'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'As a good big brother, of course, I want my little sisters to grow up happily and freely.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Do you really think I couldn't see through your little schemes, Victoria?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Grandfather's too sick to see through your tricks, but you can't fool me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Have a good sleep. When you wake up, it'll all be over.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He turns away and walks toward the spaceport without looking back.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png'}
{1: 'Science Council Testing Ground', 2: 'Four hours ago.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'm going to apply the third version of the external interface model to my Inver-Device.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Are you crazy?! That's experimental technology! You're just a regular Construct, not a specialized one!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "****—! Don't you know the risks of modifying the Inver-Device with untested tech?!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Immersing in Gestalt simulation is one thing, but actual modification is another!', 4: '2'}
{2: "I don't agree with this plan either.", 3: '92', 4: "What's going on?", 5: '95'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Ah... Keep it down, my ears are about to be blasted by you two.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...I'm seriously asking you, Teddy. What exactly are you trying to do?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I will bring back Dominik's Legacy from Reactor 1 and save this world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'The army posted that mission ages ago. But no one has ever done it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hmm... Not satisfied with that answer?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy turns off her terminal.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "According to our experiment plan, we have already reached the stage of modifying the Inver-Device, haven't we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Let me emphasize again, you're just a regular frame, not a specialized version.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'If you ever get infected, it cannot be reversed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Regular frames have more value in experiments. Specialized frames are too special to be used as references.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'This also poses a great opportunity to practically verify those two thresholds...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "You know, I'm not doing this just to verify those thresholds or to improve the Inver-Device.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I also want to save myself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...I really hate owing people favors.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Did Leonardo say something to you?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct stares absentmindedly at the model in front.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "My family once gave up everything, wanting me to become someone else's shadow.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'That is correct.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '"Saint", "Failure", and "Successor"—these are the roles my grandfather assigned to me, Leonardo, and Victoria.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "He wanted me to become Dominik's inheritor, chasing his footsteps with all my might. He hoped the entire Norman Mining Corp would become Dominik's most loyal followers.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'He saw Victoria as his most outstanding successor. From a young age, Victoria was kept by his side. Leonardo and I could only see her through... special arrangements.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Leonardo... was a failure. He couldn't pass the copolymer test. Grandfather didn't like him.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...', 3: '125', 4: 'That sounds very complicated.', 5: '124'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Just the way of big families.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Everything can be measured in terms of profit; anything can be a valuable commodity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's just that... to the old man, our values are more tangible.", 4: '1'}
{3: "It's rare to see Teddy show such a vulnerable side."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Leonardo and I teamed up to resist, thinking we had taken the most appropriate actions at the time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "But now it seems... I wouldn't be able to break away from the family without Leonardo's other arrangements.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I once thought the whole world had betrayed me, but then it suddenly seemed like that wasn't the case.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I guess I'm just trying to compensate for my youthful arrogance—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've always been protected without knowing it, and now, I want to protect others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "If we can truly retrieve this so-called Dominik's legacy, it would also greatly aid Babylonia's current research progress.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "No need. I don't want to trouble too many people for such a trivial matter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I really don't want to owe so many favors.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...Hey, do you really not need any help?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Captain Karenina, if you keep looking at me like that, I'll hack into your terminal and post all your embarrassing photos everywhere.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'And you too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Ahem, I didn't do anything.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "The third version of the Inver-Device's external interface model is relatively stable, with a failure rate of no more than 4.28%.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Don't worry. I won't plan a mission based on sacrifices.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory546.jpg'}
{3: 'Five hours ago, outside the Science Council.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "You'd better have something worth telling me this time.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonardo', 3: "I just want to bond with my little sister. You know, I don't often have the chance!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Teddy casts a glance at Leonardo, then turns around and starts walking back to the testing ground.'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Hey, relax! This time, I have something really important that can't be discussed over the terminal...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "They're sending people to Reactor 1 again. This time, the leader is... Victoria.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...How credible is your source?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "It's from my most secret informant. There won't be any mistakes.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...I told you she shouldn't stay in the sanitarium for too long. The disinfectant must have messed with her head.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Sigh. My little sister has grown up and has her own thoughts now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...Are you just going to watch them go down like that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Of course not.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Leonardo flashes a sly and confident grin.'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Don't underestimate your brother, Miss Teddy.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'I\'ve planted someone in this batch of "Heralds".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Once they reach the surface, they'll record everything and automatically send it back to a designated email at set intervals.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "This whole plan has always been a lie, and it's about time it gets exposed.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Is that all?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Um... You know, I'm being watched all the time...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'When do they set out?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'In two days.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...There's still time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Where did you get the data you sent me last time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Hey, that's classified... Wait, don't go! I'll tell you! My most secret informant tricked it out of Victoria.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Which means Dominik definitely left something at Reactor 1?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Yes, but it's impossible for any human to survive there now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "I've reviewed all the previous attempts of Project Herald. There were a few celebrations and some data was indeed sent back, but in reality...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Not a single "Herald" made it back to Babylonia alive.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Based on those records, I guess... during the earliest attempts, the Punishing Virus had not spread widely.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Some of the "Heralds" must have entered deep into Reactor 1 and... successfully brought back something.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'The "Herald" I planted will—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Can you really plant a person there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I don't believe it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy stares at Leonardo suspiciously until he raises his hands in surrender.'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Alright, I didn't plant anyone. My informant will help me take over Victoria's place in this mission.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Either I bring back the data to shut the old man up, or...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "I'll stay on the ground and take all those senior members in favor of Project Herald with me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "That's not what I meant. I was only...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'm not negotiating with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Unlike you, I'm a Construct. I'll also add the latest Inver-Device external module to my frame, so my chance of survival will be higher.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "In two days, I'll be waiting for you at the spaceport. You figure out the rest.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy turns and walks away before Leonardo could refuse.'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Even now, she's still worried about her brother...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Don't worry. In two days, everything... will be over.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{3: 'Once again, the Norman Mining Corp transport shuttle in the spaceport is preparing for takeoff.'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangBegin'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory897.jpg'}
{3: 'Ground surface, 340 kilometers from Reactor 1.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Signals... We can finally receive some signals from the nearby monitoring stations!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We have really come to the edge of the Hetero Forest!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The terminal emits a raspy static sound, with faint, nearly indistinguishable human voices coming intermittently through the signal channel.'}
{2: 'Task Force Member', 3: "Bzzz—nine o'clock—bzzz—direction—bzzz—escape!"}
